sourcesContent:
<template>
 <input
      class="form-control"
      type="text"
      v-model="mtitle"
      placeholder="검색"
      @keypress.enter=""
    />
    <button @click="searchButton()"></button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'Search',
  props: {
  },
computed:{
searchText(){
    return this.$store.state.mtitle
}
},
watch : {
    searchText(n){
        this.mtitle = n
    }
}
}
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped>
h3 {
  margin: 40px 0 0;
}
ul {
  list-style-type: none;
  padding: 0;
}
li {
  display: inline-block;
  margin: 0 10px;
}
a {
  color: #42b983;
}
</style>
